Localizing our website and apps is a ver: Localizing our website and apps is a very important part of making elementary OS available to as many people as possible. Instead of relying solely on an internal translation team, we use crowdsourcing so that anyone can submit translations with little to no technical knowledge. In order to keep our voice consistent across the entire platform, and to help new translators get started, we’ve put together this translation guide.
Apps are translated through Rosetta: the: Những ứng dụng được dịch thông qua Rosetta: giao diện dịch được lưu giữ trên Launchpad. Để nộp bản dịch, bạn nên:
translatable projects: Các dự án có thể dịch
Once you’ve made a selection, you can pr: Once you’ve made a selection, you can provide suggestions for strings that have not yet been translated, or suggest changes to strings that have already been translated. These suggestions will be evaluated by a translation team member and they will choose the most appropriate one. For a more information about Rosetta, you can refer to their documentation.
When translating you may encounter a sit: When translating you may encounter a situation where you have to decide between several ways of saying the same thing. In these situations we refer to the Ubuntu general translator guide, and for language specific issues we follow Ubuntu's team translation guidelines. Following these guides ensure uniform translations, while also allowing anyone to contribute.
If you don't want to use Rosetta, or wan: Nếu bạn không muốn sử dụng Rosetta, hoặc muốn tạo nhiều thay đổi cùng một lúc, bạn có thể dịch offline. Bạn làm như sau:
Go to a project you want to translate: Chuyển đến một dự án mà bạn muốn dịch
You are now able to request an e-mail, w: Bây giờ bạn có thể yêu cầu một e-mail, cho phép bạn liên kết bên phải để tải về các bản dịch. Bây giờ:
Choose your favorite text- or po-editor: Choose your favorite text- or po-editor (e.g. Poedit)
Once you've finished, use the &quot;Uplo: Khi bạn hoàn tất, sử dụng chức năng "tải bản dịch lên" cùng trang mà bạn tải tài liệu gốc
Our website is translated through <a hre: Trang điện tử của chúng tôi được dịch thông qua Transifex. Để nộp bản dịch, bạn nên:
For more information about Transifex, yo: Để biết thêm về Transifex, bạn có thể tham khảo thêm về những tài liệu của chúng.
As with our apps, we follow Ubuntu’s <a: As with our apps, we follow Ubuntu’s general translator guide, and for language specific issues we follow Ubuntu's team translation guidelines.
